item.title: DAVE THE DIVER sales top five million
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/dave-the-diver-sales-top-five-million

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Two million units sold in 2024.

Total sales for single-player adventure RPG DAVE THE DIVER have surpassed five million units, developer MINTROCKET announced.

The new milestone means that an additional two million copies of DAVE THE DIVER were sold throughout most of 2024, as MINTROCKET announced the game had sold three million copies on January 3.

DAVE THE DIVER first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on October 27, 2022, followed by a full release for PC on June 28, 2023, Switch on on October 26, 2023, and PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on April 16, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via MINTROCKET:

About

Welcome to DAVE THE DIVER, a marine adventure set in the mysterious Blue Hole. Explore the sea with Dave by day, and run a sushi restaurant at night. Uncover the secrets of the Blue Hole, and unwrap this deep sea mystery involving three friends, each with distinct personalities. New adventures await.

Key Features

  • Explore the Mysterious Blue Hole – An enchanting sea full of all kinds of giant creatures and fish species. Aren’t you curious about marine creatures that you never know when and where they will appear? Collect fresh ingredients while avoiding the threat of menacing creatures. Wonderous marine ecosystems and mysterious ancient artifacts. A sea full of mysteries and puzzles.
  • A Sushi Restaurant Only Open at Night – Use the fresh ingredients you caught to make and sell special sushi! If word gets around, a special customer may pay a surprise visit. If you run a sushi restaurant and raise money, you can explore deeper!
  • Danger Lurks in the Deep Sea – Beware! The strange Blue Hole caused by an strange phenomenon harbors an unknown creature that awaits you. Always make sure your gear is well strengthened. It will be essential to defending yourself against giant creatures.

item.title: Jumping Jazz Cats launches January 30, 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/jumping-jazz-cats-launches-january-30-2025

  • PC

Play, race, and hang with your feline friends.

Multiplayer party game Jumping Jazz Cats will launch for PC via Steam on January 30, 2025, publisher Team17 and developer Le Catnip Collective announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Play, race, and hang with your feline friends in this online platformer party game! Purrfect your pussycat parkour as you sprint, jump, bounce, swing, skid, and slide through a collection of collaborative and competitive mini-games set in a grandiose cartoon mansion. Get jumpin’, jazz cats!

Key Features

  • Pawsome Parkour – Grind down handrails, swing from chandeliers, bounce off cushions, perform acrobatic jumps, slide across slippery floors, and climb the curtains!
  • Be the Zoomiest Cats – While the humans are away, the cats will play! These amical mini-games are played in teams and include rip-roaring races, fat cat collectathons, and epic showdowns between shadow cats and mighty lions! To win, your cat pack will need to collaborate and pull off the fanciest pussycat parkour!
  • Welcome to the Ellington Estate – The fun takes place in the Ellington Estate, a jazzy cartoon mansion. Its spiral staircases, rooms, and passageways are filled with devious distractions, a city of furniture, and so much more!
  • Get Creative – Choose from a host of playable cats or customize your own! Get creative with your team’s style and unlockable accessories! There’s plenty of time to chill between matches, tweak the cosmetics, and try out new moves!

Highlights

  • Two-to-nine players online.
  • Four local players can join via split-screen.
  • Six levels across the mansion to discover.
  • Six cat-GIF inspired mini-games.
  • 10 original jazz tracks that influence gameplay during the choruses.
  • Mix and match levels, mini-games and songs for immense variety.
  • Blend of cooperative and competitive strategies.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer
